description:
Peace was brought to the land by http://anidb.net/ch7535 [Kenshirou] years ago. But now he is gone; merely a legend. Along with the peace came a distinction in classes, and soon a new era of violence began. A new tyranny arose, the fearsome fighters of the Gento Ko Ken style that fight for their Emperor of Heaven. Rin and Bart have grown up and formed a resistance called the Hokuto Army.
When times are at their worst, Kenshirou returns! Can he stop the Gento terror? And what is the secret of the mysterious Land of Shura?
Source: IMDB

REGULAR.description:
Bat is now a brave young man, and Lin has grown into a beautiful woman. Together, they found the North Star Army, to save the people suffering under Jakoh and the Celestial Emperor`s tyranny. But leading an army of greenhorns turns out to be an uphill battle fraught with peril. They continue to await the return of Kenshiro, the savior of legend. Rumors spread far that Ken is dead. Meanwhile, in a poor, squalid village, a "drifter" appears, looking haggard. That drifter is saved by a young boy named Haru, who hasn`t lost his sense of justice or compassion even when living in a poor village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ...e la vita continua
Le temps passe. Une ère nouvelle commence !
The Past Is Gone. The Dawn of the New Age!!
Toki wa Nagare Mata Jidai ga Ugoita...!!
時は流れまた時代が動いた...!!

REGULAR.description:
The "Drifter" saved by Haru rests up at a bar where Haru works. Then comes Geld, a Celestial Emperor Army executioner. He took great pleasure in hunting down the remnants of the "Red Dragon Party" that once stood in revolt against the Celestial Emperor. Haru tries to defeat Geld, even if it means suicide for himself, but then the drifter pulls off his cloak, revealing Kenshiro, successor to the Divine Fist of the North Star!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aitsu wa Itsu Mezameru no ka...!?
Quand va-t-il se réveiller ?
Ritorno di fiamma
When Will He Awaken?!
あいつはいつ目覚めるのか...!?

REGULAR.description:
Lin and Bat go undercover, but henchmen of the area commander, Bask, capture an innocent boy and girl after mistaking them for Lin and Bat. The callous Bask seeks to execute the girl as an example. Lin and Bat, ready to give up their lives, reveal themselves out in the open. Then, a man suddenly appears... Kenshiro, riding Raoh`s beloved steed Kokuoh!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuseishu, Kita yori Kitaru!!
La salvezza viene dal nord
Le sauveur vient du Nord !
The Savior Comes from the North!!
救世主, 北より来たる!

REGULAR.description:
With Kenshiro finally joining forces with the North Star Army, everyone in the army feels strongly reassured. In the meantime, reports of Kenshiro reach the area commander Geira. Ein, a bounty hunter coming to claim a bounty, hears from Geira that the price on Kenshiro`s head is staggering, boasts loudly that he`ll defeat him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cacciatori di taglie
Ein, le mystérieux mercenaire : « J`aurai la peau de Kenshiro ! »
Nazo no Shoukin Kasegi Ein! Ore ga Kenshirou no Kubi o Toru!!
The Mysterious Bounty Hunter, Ein! Kenshiro`s Head Is Mine!!
謎の賞金稼ぎアイン! 俺がケンシロウの首をとる!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro`s comrade-in-arms, Rei of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, is buried in a prospering town. But that town, home to Mamiya and Airi, comes under attack by Solia of the Purple Light, a general of the Celestial Emperor Army. At the same time, the North Star Army is in the final stages of an operation to capture another area. Spotting the town in peril, Kenshiro runs to save it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Another Art of Assassination! The Imperial Fist of the Source Star Is the Name!!
La scuola imperiale di Cento
Mata hitotsu ansatsuken! Sono na wa Gentokouken!!
Une autre technique de combat : l`école du « Gento »
また一つ暗殺拳! その名は元斗皇拳!

REGULAR.description:
Awaiting the North Star Army is a general of the Celestial Emperor Army, the strongest practitioner of the Imperial Fist of the Source Star, Golden Falco. He singlehandedly routs the entire North Star Army. In exchange for sparing all of their lives, he demands the death of their leader. Bat tries to protect Lin by claiming he is their leader, but Falco sees right through it and identifies Lin as the true leader. What is the tie that binds Falco and Lin!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`armata di Hokuto
L`empereur est fou de rage : « Falco, extermine le Hokuto ! »
Rage of the Celestial Emperor! Falco, Obliterate the North Star from Earth!!
Tentei Ikaru! Falco, Hokuto o Chijou Yori Nedayashi ni Seyo!!
天帝怒る! ファルコ, 北斗を地上より根絶やしにせよ!

REGULAR.description:
The North Star`s leader must be eliminated... But Lin was once saved a long time ago. Feeling chagrin at this twist of fate, Falco is ready to eliminate Lin regardless. Witnessing this, the criminal Harn brothers urge the boy guarding them to break the concrete holding them imprisoned. They turn out to be successors to one of the 108 styles of the South Star that Falco slaughtered, the South Star Twin Hawk Fist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I falchi di Nanto
L`âme du Nanto brûle. La mort héroïque des frères Harn
Nanto no Tamashii Moyu! Souzetsu HaRn Kyoudai!
The Wrath of the South Star! The Illustrious Harn Brothers!
南斗の魂燃ゆ! 壮絶ハーン兄弟!

REGULAR.description:
Going on the justification that if Ken spared his life, he couldn`t be that bad of a guy, Bat accepts Ein`s invitation to join forces, and the two capture an area by themselves. But that would lead to tragedy, as the commander of the area they captured, Beron, abducts Ein`s girl, Asuka, in vengeance. Ein`s "lady love" turns out to be a little girl! What is their relation? And what is Ein`s reason for fighting?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Ayaushi! Ai Suru Onna ni Ma no Te ga Nobita
Ein est en danger. Le diable a mis la main sur sa bien-aimée.
Ein in Danger! Hands of Evil Reach for His Love!!
Quando si vuole bene...
アイン危うし! 愛する女に魔の手が伸びた!

REGULAR.description:
The North Star Army is joined by Ein, now a former bounty hunter, and the seasoned general Rihaku. They set out for the Imperial Capital. Rihaku speaks of Falco`s past. Falco, who held his own against Raoh, once sacrificed his own leg to save a town. Meanwhile, inside the Imperial Capital, General Shoki of the Red Light sparks a revolt against Jakoh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Falco, le général du Gento ! L`ombre de Raoul...
Falco, the Brave General of the Source Star! There Lies the Shadow of Raoh...
Gento no Moushou Falco! Soko ni wa Raoh no Kage ga...
La capitale dell`Impero
元斗の猛将ファルコ! そこにはラオウの影が...

REGULAR.description:
Jakoh decrees to Falco that if he wants to save the Celestial Emperor, he must strike down Kenshiro. Reasoning that if he lost to Kenshiro, Jakoh would pin all the blame on the Celestial Emperor and make a break for it, Falco hands one of his loyal henchmen and his lover Myu the detonator switch to a bomb in the Imperial Capital, then sets out for battle. Finally, the stage is set for a major confrontation between him and Kenshiro!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ultimo ostacolo
Les sanglots de l`empereur trahi ! Où est Falco ?
Teito ni Kodamasu Tentei no Nakigoe! Falco wa Izukoni...
The Emperor`s Cries Echoes Through the Imperial Capital! Falco, Where Have You Gone?
帝都にこだます天帝の鳴き声! ファルコはいずこに...

REGULAR.description:
As the battle between Kenshiro and Falco heats up, Lin senses the Celestial Emperor`s voice. The group falls into a trap set by Jakoh and falls deep underground. There, they discover Celestial Emperor Lui. Lin and Lui turn out to be twin sisters. As it turns out, in accordance with the law that there may only be one Celestial Emperor, Falco was ordered by Jakoh to eliminate the infant Lin, but he secretly saved her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enfin, l`empereur apparaît !
L`imperatore
The Celestial Emperor Is Finally Revealed!
Tsui ni Tentei no Shoutai ga Mieta!
ついに天帝の正体が見えた!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Falco, both much worse for wear, are put in dire peril by Jakoh`s cowardly schemes. Having already sustained heavy damage all over, both men come under fire from Jakoh`s gigantic spears! Lin`s group desperately seeks to escape from their cave quickly in order to tell Falco and Kenshiro that they have no more reason to fight. Ein hammers into an iron stake with his fist until breaking through to a water vein, and the underground water pressure lets them escape. The punch he stakes his life on finally creates a miracle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Elegy for Ein! Die Bravely Than Live Without Honor!
Ein no Banka! Hokori o Sutete Ikiru Yori Atsuki Shi o!!
L`élégie de Ein. Plutôt mourir qu`être esclave !
La signora dei cieli
アインの挽歌! 誇りをすてて生きるより熱き死を!

REGULAR.description:
Having lost his trump card, the Celestial Emperor, Jakoh is left naked and alone. Abandoned by his henchmen, he gets obliterated by a furious Falco. The joy of peace returning is short-lived, though. It is found out that Taiga of the Green Light has taken Lin and is trying to cross the Sea of Death. Ein`s life leaves a powerful impression on Kenshiro, and Kenshiro grows determined to pursue Taiga. A new battle is just beginning to unfold...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La capitale s`effondre ! Jakou le démon, va en enfer !
Rapimento
Teito Houkai! Jakou, Semete Jigoku de Yume o Miyo!!
The Fall of the Imperial Capital! Jakoh, You Can Dream in Hell!!
帝都崩壊! ジャコウ, せめて地獄で夢を見よ!

REGULAR.description:
Lin is taken to a land beyond the Sea of Dead, "The Land of the Asura." In this land where might determines everything, there exists a style called the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist. Kenshiro, crossing the sea in a pirate ship, learns that the ship`s captain, the one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged Akashachi, once raided the Land of Asura, but was forced to flee and left his son behind. Upon arriving at the Land of the Asura, the first thing he sees is Falco, collapsed and gravely wounded by an Asura.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hateshinaki Shiren! Kenshirou Umi o Wataru!
Pirati
The Ordeal Never Ends! Kenshiro Crosses the Ocean!!
À l`épreuve de la mort ! Kenshiro traverse la mer !
果てしなき試練! ケンシロウ海を渡る!

REGULAR.description:
Falco was defeated by a nameless Asura due to losing his artificial leg in the middle of battle. For the sake of his honor, Falco challenges the Asura to a rematch. To deal with the Asura, who burrows underground, Falco uses the Ruinous Freezing Yellow Threat Stance to freeze the surface of the ground, then waits for the Asura to pop up. With Falco throwing himself into the fight fully ready to die, can his Imperial Fist of the Source Star take down the Asura...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La terra dei demoni
Nani ga Matsu Ankoku Tairiku! Soko wa Densetsu no Shura no Kuni!
Que réservent les ténèbres ? Le légendaire pays sanglant !
What Awaits on the Continent of Darkness? There Lies the Legendary Land of Asura!!
何が待つ暗黒大陸! そこは伝説の修羅の国!

REGULAR.description:
Alph of the Hourglass, an Asura permitted to bear a name, won a battle between Asuras, and in doing so won the right to take Lin. He is charged with eliminating Kenshiro, and uses his poison cape to paralyze Kenshiro and pummel him with attacks. However, the one who lost when two minutes pass turns out to be Alph. Meanwhile, Lin is taken away by Shachi, a wielder of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good or Evil? The Mysterious North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist Appears!!
Killer
Le bien ou le mal ? L`énigme de Hokuto-ryûken !
善か悪か? 謎の北斗琉拳現わる!!

REGULAR.description:
Shachi is a wielder of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist. His goal is to overthrow the three generals of Asura who rule the Land of Asura. Meanwhile, Kenshiro meets Shachi`s former lover, Leia, who tells him to kill Shachi, now steeped in evil. Shachi is stopped during his pursuit. In a fight between Kaizel, who can steal a man`s insides without damaging his exterior, and Shachi, what will the outcome be!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amore rubato
Elle ose parler de l`amour à la fin du siècle ! Son nom est Leïa !
Love Is Preached in the Century`s End! Her Name Is Leia!!
あえて世紀末に愛を説く! その名はレイア!!

REGULAR.description:
Shachi takes Lin to general of Aura Han`s castle, seeking to use Kenshiro to wear down Han for an easy defeat. In the guise of a rag, Shachi offers Lin up to Han as a pretense to get close to him. Han already sees through Shachi`s disguise, and the two quickly resort to battle, though Shachi opts to make a hasty retreat after confirming Han`s strength for himself. Meanwhile, Kenshiro is already inside Han`s castle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le démon Han. L`homme qui teint la neige en rouge !
Neve rosso sangue
The General of Asura, Han! The Man Who Stains White Snow into Crimson!!
羅将ハン! お前は白き雪も紅に染める男!!

REGULAR.description:
While watching Kenshiro and Han`s fight from the sidelines, Shachi reflects upon how in this land, one must be strong to survive. After apprenticing himself to an old master of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, Shachi decided to become a devil, in direct opposition to his lover Leia, who preached the value of love. He refined his skill under Jukei, who claimed that one day a savior would bring change to this land. But the name of the savior Jukei spoke of turns out to be Raoh!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il ritorno di Raoul
La légende du sauveur se propage ! Son nom est Raoul !
The Legend of the Savior of Asura! His Name Is Raoh!!
修羅の国に救世主伝説走る! その名はラオウ!!

REGULAR.description:
Due to Shachi`s scheming, Kenshiro`s presence becomes known all across the land as "Raoh`s invasion." The Asuras cower, and the people eagerly await liberation. Relieved to hear this, Jukei tells of his past... He taught the three generals of Asura the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, and led to the creation of the Land of Asura. Furthermore, this Land of Asura was Raoh and Kenshiro`s birthplace...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Casa, dolce casa
Kenshiro`s Secret Is Revealed! The Land of Asura Is His Motherland!!
Le terrible secret de Ken. Le pays des démons est sa terre natale.
暴かれたケンシロウの秘密! 修羅の国は母の国!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro is perplexed by Han`s dying words, that he can never become a savior. But the Land of Asura remains unaware of the fact that the news of Raoh`s coming is wrong, and chaos persists. In the midst of this, a villager named Kosem who eagerly awaits Raoh`s coming decides to start an all-out revolt. But the Asuras realize that Raoh will not come, and the villagers are massacred at their hands. Arriving during this, Kenshiro hears someone demanding to know why he is here and not Raoh...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Cruel Prophecy! Kenshiro, You Cannot Be the Savior!
Il liberatore
Terrible nouvelle ! Kenshiro, tu ne peux pas être le sauveur !
非情の予言! ケンシロウお前は救世主になれない!!

REGULAR.description:
With Raoh`s legend in shambles, tyranny and brutal suppression of revolts has grown worse than ever. Kosem`s son Rock, believing Raoh would come, returned to his village with the intent of joining the uprising, but is horror-stricken upon finding out about the death of his father and the collapse of Raoh`s legend. Rock decides to carry on Raoh`s legend himself, and gathers fellow soldiers to form Raoh`s Army. They boldly dare to challenge the Asuras, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I sette cavalieri
Rock, The Hero on Horseback! I Don`t Believe in Kenshiro!!
Rock, le cavalier sans peur ! Je ne crois pas en Kenshiro !!
馬上の勇士ロック! 俺はケンシロウを信じない!!

REGULAR.description:
Seeking to become the third general of Asura, Gammon, Asura of Sasori, takes Rock`s group hostage in order to ambush Kenshiro. Kenshiro sees the suffering in Rock`s eyes, and springs the trap deliberately in order to draw the real culprit, Gammon, out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ils ne veulent rien savoir ! Les sept cavaliers attaquent Kenshiro !!
La leggenda continua
Men Beyond Reasons! The Band of Seven Attacks Kenshiro!!
問答無用の男達! 遂に荒野の七人がケンを襲う!!

REGULAR.description:
With the death of the third general of Asura, Han, the second general of Asura Hyoh departs in person, at the head of his army, to suppress Kenshiro. Learning of the situation, the master of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, Jukei, shockingly claims that Kenshiro cannot win against Hyoh. Kenshiro is Hyoh`s younger brother by blood, and furthermore, Hyoh has a hidden secret...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mort de Rock ! Kenshiro, ils sont morts pour toi !!
Lotta impari
Rock`s Message of Death! Kenshiro, Hang On to Your Friend`s Life!!
ロック死の伝達! ケンシロウ友の命を受けとめよ!!

REGULAR.description:
Jukei, master of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, awaits Hyoh, who is still in search of Kenshiro. Jukei, believing Kenshiro cannot win against Hyoh, risks his life to try and restore Hyoh`s memories. Meanwhile, Shachi, in pursuit of his own ambition, hands Lin over to the first general, Kaioh. But Kaioh, after taking Lin to his castle, gives off an evil fighting spiritual energy, and declares himself the creator of the new century.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Announcing the Creator of the New Century! My Name Is Demon Kaioh!!
Le Créateur du nouveau monde ! Mon nom est Kaio le démon !!
Maestro e discepolo
新世紀創造主宣言! 俺の名は魔神カイオウ!!

REGULAR.description:
Jukei seeks to restore Hyoh`s sealed-off memories, and draw out the "Key" to destroying the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, the primary thing Kenshiro would need to win against Kaioh. Kenshiro and Hyoh belong to the main family of the North Star, and Hyoh was the only person to learn the location of the hidden technique. But even after coming to terms with reality, no technique seems to be able to break the seal on his memories. Meanwhile, Kenshiro, in his quest to rescue Lin, sets foot in Kaioh`s castle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il colpo segreto
Le sceau du démon ! Le Hokuto originel, 2 000 ans de tragédies !!
The Seal of the Devil! 2000 Year Tragedy of the North Star Is Revealed!!
悪魔の封印! それが北斗宗家ニ千年の悲劇を語る!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro loses badly to Kaioh. Even Ken`s ultimate technique, the Unconcious Transmigration, doesn`t seem to slow Kaioh down. Kaioh declares that the sealed memories which only Hyoh knows are the only key to defeating him in existence. Meanwhile, Jukei struggles to bring back the old, compassionate Hyoh, the one who thought strongly of his younger brother as a child, and stubbornly refused to ever divulge the location of the hidden technique. To do this, he stakes his own life upon hitting a destructive point: Jukei`s ultimate destructive point. This goes beyond his expectations and drastically transfigures Hyoh`s...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Little Brother Ken in Danger! Hyoh, Open Up Your Kind Soul!
Pericolo mortale
Ton frère, Ken, est en danger ! Hyo, tu es bon, alors ouvre ton cœur !!
弟ケンの危機! やさしきヒョウよ今こそ心を開け!!

REGULAR.description:
Having lost to Kaioh, Kenshiro is cruelly crucified. Shachi watches protectively from the shadows, but then challenges Kaioh, who wields a superior North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, to a direct confrontation. However, Shachi doesn`t stand a chance against him. Just as Kaioh is about to deliver the finishing blow to Shachi, Akashachi showers him in concentrated sulfuric acid, stalling him long enough to rescue Kenshiro and Shachi. Lin gets swept out of sight in the current... And Akashachi, while trying to finish Kaioh off, meets his end at Kaioh`s hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il ritorno del pirata rosso
Kenshiro condamné à mort ! Le Ciel envoie le dieu de la mer !!
Kenshiro on the Execution Stand! The Heaven Has Unleashed the God of the Sea!
処刑台のケンシロウ! 遂に天は海神を走らせた!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro bears heavy damage from his fight with Kaioh. Under the pretext of giving Akashachi a burial at sea, Shachi seeks to withdraw and give Kenshiro a chance to heal. Kaioh returns to prevent that, and as Shachi`s group starts down the waterway, Kaioh once again appears before them! Is this the end of the line!? Shachi is ready to throw in the towel, but suddenly, Kaioh`s evil fighting spiritual energy gets extinguished. Kenshiro, whose pulse should have stopped, stands before them...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il sacrificio dei pirati
Kaioh`s Declaration of Victory! The Phantom of the North Star Attacks!!
Victoire éphémère pour Kaio ! L`esprit du Hokuto lui fait face !!
カイオウつかの間の勝利宣言! 北斗の幻が彼を襲う!!

REGULAR.description:
Shachi is determined to protect Kenshiro, whom he believes to be the savior. He continues his journey, disguising himself as a rag and hiding Kenshiro in a coffin. Kaioh is consumed with fear of Kenshiro`s limitless potential, and instructs his henchmen to search for Lin. For her part, after getting swallowed by underground currents, Lin is rescued by Kaioh`s younger sister, Sayaka. Meanwhile, heavily scarred by the killing of Jukei, Hyoh seeks out Sayaka to mend his wounds, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Destined Encounter of Hyoh and Ken! Both Are Yet to Know Their Secrets!!
Les destins se croisent : Hyo rencontre Ken ! Il ne reconnaît pas son petit frère !!
Prova di amicizia
運命の出会いヒョウとケン! いまだ兄は弟を知らず!!

REGULAR.description:
Shachi finally brings Kenshiro to a safe haven. Around that time, Commander of Asura Kain, having received instructions to search for Shachi and Kenshiro, sets about his search in hopes of attaining the coveted position of third general. The cabin where Shachi arrived finally gets searched, but due to poor timing, the only one there is the cabin`s elderly caretaker. Asura henchmen intrude inside... Meanwhile, in order to draw Hyoh to the dark world, Kaioh takes his own younger sister by blood, Sayaka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il risveglio di Ken
Kaioh`s Evil Decision! Cold Blood Runs Through My Body!!
Le choix de Kaioh le démon ! Un froid glacial parcourt tout mon corps !!
カイオウ悪魔の選択! 俺の全身には冷血が脈打つ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaioh kills his own younger sister, Sayaka, and spreads word that Kenshiro is the one behind it. Hyoh is consumed by powerful hatred. Kaioh schemes to bring the main family of the North Star to an end. Right in the middle of the funeral for Sayaka being held in Kaioh`s castle, an Asura named Gyoko`s battle train crashes in. Gyoko, rolling in front of Kaioh, bears a message from Kenshiro: I am never defeated twice! Hyoh, believing that Kenshiro killed Sayaka, is consumed in powerful hatred upon hearing that, and takes his first step towards the dark world...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Desiderio di vendetta
Kenshiro`s Challenge! Never Be Defeated Twice!!
Le défi de Kenshiro ! Cette fois tu ne me battras pas !!
ケンシロウの挑戦状! オレには2度の敗北はない!!

REGULAR.description:
Having ventured into the dark world, Hyoh`s personality becomes evil and twisted. Upon seeing how he had changed, his adoring, devoted Vice General Nagato is stricken with unbearable grief. Nagato encounters Shachi and Kenshiro, both heavily injured from fighting Kaioh. Despite their positions as enemies, Nagato senses something heart-stirring in Kenshiro`s eyes, and hides the two of them in his house...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyo le tyran et les larmes du garde ! Qui pourra l`arrêter ?
La rivelazione
The Tyrant Hyoh and His Sorrowful Aide! Who Will Stop Him Now?!
暴君ヒョウと悲しき側近! 誰が彼を止めるのか!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro`s group hears that Hyoh is exploiting villagers to bring back the birthplace of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, the Holy Temple of Asura, from the bottom of a swamp. Kenshiro faces off with Hyoh, who has gone there and turned into a demon. While Kenshiro senses that Hyoh is his elder brother, Hyoh`s memories remain sealed and lost, and Hyoh, seeing Kenshiro only as Sayaka`s murderer, is consumed anew with vengeance. When Kaioh hears reports of the fighting, he lets out resounding laughter at how smoothly things are going for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duello fraterno
Le combat des deux frères ! Les yeux de Hyo ne verseront plus jamais de larmes !!
The Battle of the Blood Brothers! Tears Will Never Return to Hyoh.
骨肉の兄弟対決! もうヒョウの瞳に涙は帰らない!!

REGULAR.description:
In the midst of Kenshiro and Hyoh`s back-and-forth battle, when Kenshiro hits a pressure point, Hyoh uses an evil art to gouge out his own flesh where the pressure point is located. With the battle between Kenshiro and Hyoh, Kaioh is more confident than ever in the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist`s new century. When he has Lin brought before him, Kaioh`s real face surfaces amidst his evil fighting spiritual energy. His face bears an eerie resemblance to Raoh`s... Of course it would - Kaioh is Raoh`s older brother!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`école Hokuto est en danger ! Kaio convoite la fille de l`empereur céleste !!
Scontro crudele
The North Star on the Brink of Death! Kaioh Reaches Out for the Celestial Emperor!!
北斗存亡の危機! カイオウの魔の手が天帝にのびた!!

REGULAR.description:
Hyoh`s evil fighting spiritual energy has vanished! But his memories haven`t completely returned. His mind clouded with memories of his childhood departure from Kenshiro, Hyoh turns his fist upon Kenshiro once more. Shachi senses danger and finally acts. As Kenshiro catches a glimpse of tears in Hyoh`s eyes, his fist slackens, and to save him, he rushes Hyoh from behind! Then the defeated Hyoh says something unexpected...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Barlumi di memoria
Les deux frères se retrouvent ! Kenshiro je t`attendais !!
Tearful Reunion of the Brothers! Kenshiro, I`ve Been Waiting for You!!
涙の兄弟再会! ケンシロウ, 俺はお前を待っていた!!

REGULAR.description:
Hyoh regains his memories, and upon hearing of Hyoh`s reconciliation with Kenshiro, Kaioh does a complete about-face. Heavy with anger towards Shachi at having made their reconciliation possible, Kaioh orders the Asuras to hunt Shachi down. Meanwhile, Hyoh has recovered from the worst of his injuries, and tells Kenshiro and Shachi that there is a hidden technique sealed within the Holy Temple of Asura, the sanctum of the main family of the North Star. Leia and Lin`s love opens the way to the hidden technique`s hiding place, and underground, under the watchful gaze of female visages, Kaioh and Shachi do battle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La statua
Shachi se bat au nom de l`amour ! Pour Kaio, tout ceci est ridicule !!
Shachi`s Battle for Love! Kaioh Will Ridicule with Laughter!
シャチ愛の戦い! カイオウ, それを愚かと笑うのか!!

REGULAR.description:
Shachi is believed to have already died fighting Kaioh to protect Leia. But the female visages in the Holy Temple of Asura create a mysterious resonance, and with tears in his eyes, Shachi rises again. Even as heavily overwhelmed as he had been, he launches a counterattack so ferocious that it even shocks Kaioh. It all comes from the power of love... Kaioh, now convinced that the main family`s ultimate technique is love, seeks to prove the superiority of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist that he uses for his evil ultimate art.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mort de Shachi, le guerrier de l`amour ! Sache que sans l`amour, l`homme n`est rien !!
La morte di Ork
The Fall of Shachi, Warrior of Love! Love Is Everything, My Friends!!
愛の戦士シャチ死す! 友よ, 愛こそすべてと知れ!!

REGULAR.description:
The place Kaioh chooses for a showdown is the Swamp of Demon, a place teeming with evil fighting spiritual energy, and the place where his evil began. Leia gives Kenshiro Shachi`s protector as a memento, and Kenshiro sets foot into the swamp alone. There, the tragic past of Kaioh and Raoh`s mother, and Kenshiro and Hyoh`s mother, is revealed! Then, right before the battle, Kaioh hits a destructive point on Lin! What terrifying effect will it have...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amore contro odio
Elle se sacrifie par amour ! Voilà d`où vient la haine de Kaio !!
Tragic Victim of Love! Kaioh`s Foundation of Evil!!
悲しき愛の犠牲者! これがカイオウ悪の原点だ!!

REGULAR.description:
Because of the destructive point that Kaioh hit, when Lin wakes up, she may very well fall in love with the first person she sees, regardless of whom it may be. Kenshiro, shaking with rage, fights with Kaioh. Realizing Lin`s peril, Hyoh once more overstrains his heavily injured body to save Lin... What is the disgrace Hyoh speaks of, that twisted Kaioh as a child!? And what of the feelings Raoh told Kenshiro that he had towards Kaioh!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaio a été humilié dans sa jeunesse ! Le Ciel s`émeut du destin de Lynn !!
Kaioh`s Disgraceful Past! The Heaven Recreate`s Lin`s Destiny!!
L`anello della morte
カイオウ屈辱の歴史! 天はリンの運命もぬりかえる!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Kaioh`s deadly struggle continues. But Kenshiro is put in dire peril when his body becomes paralyzed by gas in a cave beneath the Swamp of Demon. Meanwhile, learning of the destructive point hit on Lin, the Asuras go after her. Danger draws closer and closer to Lin as she begins to regain consciousness. Will Hyoh make it in time!? In the midst of battle, Kenshiro learns that Kaioh also bears the blood of the main family of the North Star. There is a story behind that, a tragic tale about the main family of the North Star from before the Divine Fist of the North Star was founded...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I due cugini
Plus que trois épisodes ! L`histoire sanglante du Hokuto dure depuis plus de 2 000 ans !!
The Final Chapter: The Last Three Episodes! Here Is the 2,000 Year-Old History of the Main Family of the North Star!!
最終章 残り3回! これが北斗宗家2000年の血の歴史!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaioh`s fist no longer has any effect on Kenshiro. In contrast to the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, whose style has already been perfected and has no further progress, the Divine Fist of the North Star is a style which continues to constantly evolve on the battlefield. Thus, by using the hidden technique Kenshiro acquired, the art to deflect the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, it is rendered completely ineffective. Seeing his chances of winning slipping away, Kaioh casts off the armor he wears to contain his evil fighting spiritual energy, and goes all-out in a last ditch battle! Meanwhile, Black Yaksha meets his end protecting Lin, and Hyoh is in dire peril once more! But then, some unexpected backup arrives...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avant-dernier épisode ! L`apparition d`un troisième homme va influencer le destin de Lynn !!
Il ritorno di Bart
Prologue to the Final Episode! A Third Man Appears to Determine Lin`s Fate!!
最終話 序章! リンの運命を握る第3の男が現れた!!

REGULAR.description:
After saving Lin and Hyoh, the North Star Army rushes towards the place where the ferocious battle between Kenshiro and Kaioh is unfolding. Kaioh has cast off his armor and fights desperately using his evil fighting spiritual energy, while Kenshiro shows that he has the advantage by far. But Kaioh, who can`t even hurt him with his evil fighting spiritual energy now, borrows his mother`s strength for one final blow! Kaioh gets sent flying into the sky by a geyser erupting from beneath the grave, and when he swoops down upon Kenshiro, Kenshiro`s fist slams into him! Can the history of fate that has laste since the era of the main family of the North Star be put to rest, at long last!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Addio, Ken
Adieu, Kenshiro !! Adieu, Hokuto-shinken !!
The Final Episode: Farewell, Kenshiro!! Farewell, the Divine Fist of the North Star!!
さらばケンシロウ!! さらば北斗神拳!!
Eigoban Soushuuhen Hokuto no Ken Dai 6 Bu Kaiou-hen
Fist of the North Star: The Kaio Saga
英語版総集編 北斗の拳 第6部 カイオウ編
Opening
Ending

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 北斗の拳_(テレビアニメ)

Fist of the North Star Part 2
Ken il guerriero 2
Ken le survivant 2
世紀末救世主伝説 北斗の拳2
FOTNS 2
hnk2
